paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant K437fs, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic lung adenocarcinoma with multiple mutations
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Liquid biopsy at that time reported a reemergence of EGFR T790M as well as a BRCA2 K437fs mutation.

functional_data.summary: The K437fs mutation is likely to disrupt normal BRCA2 function, contributing to cancer progression.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was mentioned in the context of a complex clinical case involving multiple mutations.
key_quotes: Liquid biopsy at that time reported a reemergence of EGFR T790M as well as a BRCA2 K437fs mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
